issue.title: [CF 423] Default for meta icons sorted by high duration
issue.body:
When none of the icons in a meta icon sorted by high duration are displaying a timer to compare, the metaicon doesn't show anything. Wouldn't it be better to let the meta icon default to the normal prioritization when that happens? Sorting by low duration already yields these results.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #423 | Raw

comments.body:
If it looks like a bug, swims like a bug, and quacks like a bug, then it probably is a bug.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

I just experienced another related bug with a meta icon sorted by low duration. It seems to completely bug out on me now. It just uses normal priority and doesn't care for duration at all.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

(r416) Meta icons that are set to sort should once again sort

Caused by a minor code change that exposed some poor coding that happened a long time ago.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
